mapper.select: select se.no, se.day, se.order_no, me.name name from(select * from sell) se inner join member me on se.member_no = me.no order by no desc

select sn.no, sn.sell_no, sn.amount, sn.sell_price, sn.lot_code, sn.item_no, it.code code, it.name name from(select * from sell_detail where sell_no = #{mainNo}) sn inner join item it on sn.item_no = it.no

select * from( select m.no, m.name name, c.name client_name, m.day from(select s.no, m.name, s.client_no, s.day from sell s inner join member m on s.member_no = m.no) m inner join client c on m.client_no = c.no ) where no > 0
and name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' and client_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
and no in
#{arr}
and no in
#{arr}
order by no desc offset #{beginRow} rows fetch next #{pageSize} rows only

select distinct(sell_no) from(select od.no, od.sell_no, od.lot_code, it.code item_code, it.name item_name, it.in_price, it.out_price from sell_detail od inner join item it on od.item_no = it.no)
where item_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
where lot_code like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
select iw.no,iw.sell_no, it.code, iw.amount item_code, it.name item_name, iw.lot_code from(select * from sell_detail where sell_no = #{mainNo}) iw inner join item it on iw.item_no = it.no
